markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 6"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Shove Down](/Feats.aspx?ID=1793) <actions string="Free Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Rogue" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=139" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 135 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
Trained in [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3)

**Requirements**
Your last action was a successful [Shove](/Actions.aspx?ID=38).

</column>

---

You leverage your weight to topple foes that you move. You attempt to [Trip](/Actions.aspx?ID=40) the target, even if the target is no longer in your reach.
name: Shove Down
requirement: Your last action was a successful  Shove .
requirement_markdown: Your last action was a successful [Shove](/Actions.aspx?ID=38).
